title: What's on Your Mind?
body: You've just covered a lot of information. Do you have any questions you'd like to ask your facilitator? Take a moment to gather your thoughts here. And don't worry--this won't be tracked. This is just for you.
instruction: Enter your thoughts in the text box.

_notepad.ariaRegion: This component is a text area intended to retain user input temporarily. Input is deleted at the end of the browser session or by slecting the clear input button.
